tha-ap446:0.3_0: As he was trying to the senior monks,
tha-ap446:1.2_0: of the thirty-two marks of grass
tha-ap446:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhalliya.
tha-ap446:2.3_0: ‘The Buddha is the Perfected One, the Buddha,
tha-ap446:3.1_0: compassionate for one, who is compassionate,
tha-ap446:4.2_0: and sat on the seat spread out.
tha-ap446:4.3_0: I took hold of a snare
tha-ap446:5.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
tha-ap446:6.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
tha-ap446:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap446:6.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap446:7.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap446:9.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
